text: Approval for changes to the therapy head positioning, modifications of the control panel, addition of a servicing modem, changes to the air flow within the device, material changes to the patient table, ECG monitor model replacement, change of the available X-ray features, software modifications, labeling changes, and integration of the water circulation device with its control computer.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name Dorneir Lithotripter S and is indicated for the fragmentation of 5 to 25 millimeter kidney stones such as renal calyx stones and renal pelvic stones.
